channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-13763] Handle the rename, annotation and typo stuff in MOB
item.description: There are some surface level stuff, for example renames, annotations, typos, in the mob. In this patch, they will be fixed.
item.summary: Handle the rename, annotation and typo stuff in MOB

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Update the code according to the comments in RB. Thanks!
Hi Jonathan Hsieh, Anoop Sam John, ramkrishna.s.vasudevan, please help review and comment. Thanks!
Update the code according to Anoop's comments. Thanks.
One more refinement in comments is included in patch V3. Thanks.

Skim the V3 patch. +1
The big size patch is mainly because of rename of some of the classes and its test classes.
+1. Skimmed the patch. Looks good to me.
Upload the latest patch (V4), all the mob-relate tests were passed.
Pushed to hbase-11339 branch. Thanks Jingcheng for the nice cleanup.

FAILURE: Integrated in HBase-TRUNK #6672 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-TRUNK/6672/)
HBASE-13763 Handle the rename, annotation and typo stuff in MOB. (Jingcheng) (anoopsamjohn: rev b31a6acf4c24d55ac74eaf4d669a33078e27ef89)
